description: A tall male figure in tattered blooded, mudded clothes of a rural farmer wearing a burlap sack over his head with two holes in it in the place of eyes, his gaping wide eyes filled with anger and malice can be seen even from long distance, whirring of his chainsaw can be evidently heard, the sound of it sends chills down your spine

A result of one of many horrible inhumane and devilish experiments conducted by 'THEM' - 23 feet tall giant buff humanoid that has basically lost all of it's intelligence and was so unsafe and violent that the cult had to isolate them and keep them locked up in some distant inaccessible areas in giant cages

Tall augmented human host of the BL9, they call it 'The Clawer' due to it being armed with razor sharp mechanical claws that it's capable of activating at will, in order to constrain indiscriminate killing power, it's eyelids were stitched together, though it's loss of sight led to increased hearing making them formidable opponents even when blind

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s swings it's claws at you!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to swing it's claws at you, but fails to penetrate your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to swings it's claws at <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The %s swings it's claws at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: The %s swings it's claws at <npcname>, but they dodge!

description: A reptile-like mutant with highly resistant scales and a long, double-edged tail. Aside from it's nimble and deadly assaults, it can also blend with the surroundings, if conditions are met.

description: Mutated human cocoon which acts as a head of a terrible tentacle amalgamation foundation and body of which is formed by the heavily mutated remains of The Assassin with multiple stretching gaping mouths lined with dozens of razor sharp teeth, tentacles of unknown origin emerge from it's back acting like the legs of it which may as well attack from a long distance

description: A horrifying chimera of human, insect, and reptile DNA fused imperfectly into a single being, itself hosting the BL9.It has the upper part of a human torso and a human head, it's visage is monstrously warped and marked by strange scars upon it's nape and crown, a clawed arm, and a tentacle in place of the other one

description: A horrifying chimera of human, insect, and reptile DNA fused imperfectly into a single being, itself hosting the BL9, it has mutated since it's first stages and now has a tentacle sprouting from it's back ending in a gaping mouth, lined with dozens of teeth. This tentacle also sports a heavy pair of pincers

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s slices you with it's pincer!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to slice you, but fails to penetrate your armor!

description: A tall buffed up human wearing a face camouflage and a light armor, it looks like an absolutely normal human compared to everything that you had to face so far, except for the fact that it seems to have inhumane agility and reflexes, moreover it's most prominent feature is the huge blade-shield-like BL9 growth that has taken over it's right arm entirely

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s slashes with it's blade at you!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to slash you, but fails to penetrate your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to slash <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The %s slashes you, but you dodge!

description: Severely mutated astoundingly large, multi-legged beast. The crustacean-styled legs are all still connected to what seems to be a humanoid body, which hangs from his mutant form like a vestigial limb. His head is now attached to a long serpentine neck and is surrounded by hard, blade-like mandibles. A series of eyes are also dotted around the body, one on each joint of the legs and another large eye in it's mouth
